definition: to grab/to catch/to arrest/to snatch/to scratch
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: Clean a snatch-test-size kettlebell from the floor.
sentences.chinese: 將抓舉測試所使用重量的壺鈴從地面上翻起。

sentences.english: But what are the two techniques used in the snatch?
sentences.chinese: 抓舉的兩種技術是指什麼呢？

sentences.english: Ladies and Gentlemen, The competition will start with snatch movement in two minutes.
sentences.chinese: 女士們先生們，抓舉比賽將在2分鐘之後開始。
